item.title: [sld] Fabled Passage
item.description:
Land

{T}, Sacrifice Fabled Passage: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Then if you control four or more lands, untap that land.

item.title: [one] Elesh Norn, Mother of Machines
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Praetor

Vigilance

If a permanent entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

Permanents entering the battlefield don't cause abilities of permanents your opponents control to trigger.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [khm] Vorinclex, Monstrous Raider
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Praetor

Trample, haste

If you would put one or more counters on a permanent or player, put twice that many of each of those kinds of counters on that permanent or player instead.

If an opponent would put one or more counters on a permanent or player, they put half that many of each of those kinds of counters on that permanent or player instead, rounded down.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [snc] Urabrask, Heretic Praetor
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Praetor

Haste

At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, the next time they would draw a card this turn, instead they exile the top card of their library. They may play it this turn.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [dmu] Sheoldred, the Apocalypse
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Praetor

Deathtouch

Whenever you draw a card, you gain 2 life.

Whenever an opponent draws a card, they lose 2 life.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [neo] Jin-Gitaxias, Progress Tyrant
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Praetor

Whenever you cast an artifact, instant, or sorcery spell, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. This ability triggers only once each turn. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

Whenever an opponent casts an artifact, instant, or sorcery spell, counter that spell. This ability triggers only once each turn.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [one] Elesh Norn, Mother of Machines
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Praetor

Vigilance

If a permanent entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

Permanents entering the battlefield don't cause abilities of permanents your opponents control to trigger.

item.title: [one] Phyrexian Obliterator
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Horror

Trample

Whenever a source deals damage to Phyrexian Obliterator, that source's controller sacrifices that many permanents.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [one] Slobad, Iron Goblin
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Goblin Artificer

{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Add an amount of {R} equal to the sacrificed artifact's mana value. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [one] Koth, Fire of Resistance
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Koth

+2: Search your library for a basic Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

−3: Koth, Fire of Resistance deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

−7: You get an emblem with "Whenever a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, this emblem deals 4 damage to any target."

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [one] Jor Kadeen, First Goldwarden
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Rebel

Trample

Whenever Jor Kadeen, First Goldwarden attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of equipped creatures you control. Then if Jor Kadeen's power is 4 or greater, draw a card.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [ppro] Aether Vial
item.description:
Artifact

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Aether Vial.

{T}: You may put a creature card with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Aether Vial from your hand onto the battlefield.

item.title: [sld] Zur the Enchanter
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Wizard

Flying

Whenever Zur the Enchanter attacks, you may search your library for an enchantment card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Shadowborn Apostle
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

A deck can have any number of cards named Shadowborn Apostle.

{B}, Sacrifice six creatures named Shadowborn Apostle: Search your library for a Demon creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.description:

item.title: [one] Blue Sun's Twilight
item.description:
Sorcery

Gain control of target creature with mana value X or less. If X is 5 or more, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1678101037

item.title: [slx] Baldin, Century Herdmaster
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

As long as it's your turn, each creature assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

Whenever Baldin, Century Herdmaster attacks, up to one hundred target creatures each get +0/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1678101037

item.title: [slx] Vikya, Scorching Stalwart
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

Training (Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

{4}{R}, {Q}, Discard a card: Vikya, Scorching Stalwart deals damage equal to its power to any target. If excess damage was dealt to a creature this way, draw a card. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1678101037

item.title: [slx] Aisha of Sparks and Smoke
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

{R/W}: Aisha of Sparks and Smoke gains first strike until end of turn.

Whenever Aisha deals combat damage, you may cast a sorcery spell from your hand with mana value less than or equal to that damage without paying its mana cost.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1678101037

item.title: [slx] The Howling Abomination
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Beast Warrior

Haste

The Howling Abomination has trample as long as you've cast three or more spells this turn.

Whenever The Howling Abomination becomes the target of a spell, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn and deals 2 damage to each opponent.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1678101037

item.title: [slx] Zethi, Arcane Blademaster
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Soldier

Multikicker {W/U}

When Zethi, Arcane Blademaster enters the battlefield, exile up to X target instant cards from your graveyard, where X is the number of times Zethi was kicked. Put a kick counter on each of them.

Whenever Zethi attacks, copy each exiled card you own with a kick counter on it. You may cast the copies.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1678101037

item.title: [slx] Tadeas, Juniper Ascendant
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Monk

Reach

Tadeas has hexproof unless it's attacking.

Whenever a creature you control with reach attacks, untap it and it can't be blocked by creatures with greater power this combat.

Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1678101037

item.title: [slx] Maarika, Brutal Gladiator
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

Maarika, Brutal Gladiator must be blocked if able.

As long as it's your turn, Maarika has indestructible.

Whenever Maarika deals damage to a creature, if that creature was dealt excess damage this turn, that creature's controller sacrifices a noncreature, nonland permanent.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1678101037

item.title: [slx] Immard, the Stormcleaver
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Soldier

Whenever Immard, the Stormcleaver enters the battlefield or attacks, put a charge counter on it or remove one from it. When you remove a counter this way, choose one —

• Immard deals 4 damage to any target.

• Immard gains lifelink and indestructible until end of turn.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1678101037
